extendedInfo.description: Transform any picture using this edge detection tool. Take a photo or select your image from the gallery to convert into a whole new picture with the edges detected. You can then save your new image.This app produces fantastic artistic results and allows a different perspective on images.The app can be moved to the SD card to save storage on the phone (Applies to Android 2.2 and up)This is the full version and contains NO ads.
